name: Mossy Pixels
description:
Mossy Pixels is a 100% free point & click game, the main purpose of which is to help you wind down, relax, and enjoy the moment.



Here's how you can play it:

1) Click anywhere on the mossy cover;
2) Watch as the moss slowly dissolves, following a pattern underneath;
3) Repeat points #1 and #2 until the entire drawing is visible;
4) Pat yourself on the back for a job well done!
5) Repeat this process for up to 150 mesmerizing patterns! :3
